title: Why do people still pick EZ?
body: Makes me go insane seeing such a useless champ

replies.body: EZ is useless...? Since fucking when? O.o

Why do people still pick Mord?

Why do people still pick Urgot?

Because this is a fucking game.

Because people like playing him, same way people like playing stuff that isn't meta.


Not everyone is a meta slave.
You should dodge if you want to win. Not all players play ranked to win.
